mapper.select: SELECT b.*, ifnull(u.username, '-') as username, u.profile FROM board b LEFT OUTER JOIN user u ON b.insId = u.id WHERE delDt is null ORDER BY b.id DESC LIMIT #{limit}, 5
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE delDt is null
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board VALUES(null, #{title}, #{content}, #{id}, now(), null, null)
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET delDt = now() WHERE id = #{id}
